Posts.Content: Hi, I am Jacqueline I was diagnosed with breast cancer in July 2004. I had a mastectomy on my right breast. Nine nodes were removed from under my arm, one of these tested postive for cancer. I have gone through one circle of chemo already. I am on the second cycle I am on taxol. I have heard about using the leaves of the paw-paw to help with the fight the cancer...but I never knew the name....
Posts.Title: Has Anybody Heard of The Graviola Benefits

Posts.Content: Hi, Do not give up taking the taxol...I had adrimycin and cyclophosphemide, I am taking taxol at present...the first two did not really make me sick, I slept a lot but this one taxol nearly killed my feet after two days intaking it my feet was stuff and sore...but this will not stop me from receiving the others I am taking the second dose on 05-02-01. So you hang on and take yours...prayer beats all.
Posts.Title: Chemo
